title: Sacramental - Sibylla mp3  (2014)
description:
SACRAMENTAL was formed September 2008 in Latvia. The basic musical style has been defined by the band as Modern Thrash Metal and until recently the band advertised for a regular Drummer on-line
Band influences range from Metallica, Machine Head, Trivium, Devildriver. Where many bands attempt to recreate that of their heroes, Sacramental have created their own sound
For those of you with a love of Thrash Metal you should check out Sacramental, I can tell you without a doubt, you will definately dig the sound of this band.
We all know Europe hails some of the latest, greatest metal bands from all the subgenresthat exist within the metal circle. Listening to these guys on this morning (for the first time) with it's orchestral opening that then leads to fast dissorted guitar rhythms and heavy beats and timeless grooves, gave me the feeling the future of metal is in great shape and in the hands of these guys, a new generation of metal arises.
We will be hearing a lot from, Sacramental, in years to come. These guys will definately turn heads amongst die hard metalheads.


Discography:
Sibylla    2014 (Debut release)
